skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the "eiff" Mutsuki-class destroyer, Nagatsuki! I did a lot of "protikshin" and "trainsport" missions, and fought hard in the Battle of "Coola Golf"! It's true! ... What's on my backpack? Heh-heh-heh, it's my secret weapon against dangerous strangers, its name is Peepsy!
skins.acquisition: You're the Commander? You look a bit suspicious, but... you don't seem dangerous anyhow. The name's Nagatsuki! Heh, if you underestimate me, you're gonna regret it!
skins.login: Teehee! What fun things will we do today, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: When I take this ring, stick my finger through it, and pull as hard as I can... It makes a really loud noise, like when a torpedo goes kaboom!
skins.secretaryIdle2: My service history? I helped Naka when she was in trouble! I think...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, how do you say this word? "Try-yumf"? I dunno what that means, but I think I can do that by setting off Peepsy!
skins.secretaryTouch: Teehee~ Commander, do you wanna find out what it takes for me to set off Peepsy's alarm?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eeeep...! I knew you're a dangerous stranger! Hear Peepsy roar!

skins.shipDescription: Nagatsuki the kitty maid is at your service~ Do your best to not fall madly in love with my cute looks~! Hehe~
skins.acquisition: Nagatsuki the kitty maid is at your service~ Do your best to not fall madly in love with my cute looks~! Hehe~
skins.login: Welcome back, Master? Oh, you wanna hear that again? Sure, but first I want strawberry ice cream!
skins.details: Sure I'm wearing a maid costume, but I can't do any maid work with these kitty paw gloves on! Sooorry?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I still have Peepsy with me~! I've just hidden it somewhere!
skins.secretaryIdle2: What do maids even do...? Oh, I know! Commander, I'm thirsty! I want some tea! Hehehe!
skins.secretaryIdle3: My kitty paws are really nice and soft. Don't you wanna feel them? Here you go! Kitty paws to the face!
skins.secretaryTouch: You really like maids, huh~ But just so you know, Peepsy's gonna go off if you keep poking me!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I totally forgot I can't set off Peepsy with these kitty paw gloves oooon!
